backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report mapping Valentine features to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend Valentine components, styling, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining color variables, themes, and global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main interactive Valentine page with Yes/No logic, evasive No button, emoji spawns, and success screen with meme image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks implementing Internet Identity login, identity management, and state handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Romantic Valentine-themed Tailwind styles, gradients, animations, and custom UI components for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, including Valentine-themed feature requirements, existing features, and pending requests for the interactive webpage.
